summary: Dowdy housewife Kitty dotes on her self-centered husband but divorces him when his mistress shows up at their home one day to break up their marriage. Bob had become bored with her ... See full summary Â»
cast: Norma Shearer|Rod La Rocque|Marie Dressler|Gilbert Emery|Hedda Hopper|Raymond Hackett|Sally Eilers|Tyrell Davis|Wilfred Noy|William H. O'Brien|Sybil Grove|Mary Gordon|Helene Millard|Dickie Moore
title: Seamos alegres
